name: Abode-star
tagline: ABODE-star is an integrated development environment (IDE) for designing behaviour based agents.
body:
**ABODE-star** is an integrated development environment (IDE) for Behavior Oriented Design (BOD).

It is now still in beta mode (despite it's numbering scheme) and allows for the creation of POSH plans. The plans are able to be used in either [posh#](https://github.com/suegy/posh-sharp) or [jyPOSH](http://sourceforge.net/projects/jyposh/).

For further information on **ABODE** or **BOD** consult the project website:
[Joanna Bryson's ABODE page](http://www.cs.bath.ac.uk/~jjb/web/BOD/abode.html)

----

We currently provide a couple of showcases of what has been done using ABODE-star and POSH.
---
## Downloads ##
Find all files needed to run the ABODE plus some additional things in our [Downloads](https://github.com/suegy/abode-star/wiki/Downloads). :)

###Starcraft AI Show Case
![ABODE-star showing a POSH plan for StarCraft](https://github.com/suegy/abode-star/blob/master/website-rsrc/pics/ABODE-star-SCAI.png)

A first show case of the ABODE usage is the StarCraft AI Demo by Simon [Starcraft: Brood War AI](http://code.google.com/p/abode-star/wiki/StarCraftAIShowcase)

Use it at your own risk!

### Old Version now deprecated

Due to the transition from sourceforge and the new features the previous version of [ABODE](https://sourceforge.net/projects/abode/) is deprecated. Due to google dropping their hosting we are now on github.

The repository on sourceforge is kept to allow for tracing all changes and version.
